name: MiniPort !
description:
You have just started your career at PSA Singapore and one of your missions assigned is to manage the loading and unloading processes of containers. Specifically, you are required to deliver unloaded freights to the warehouses on-site or cargo ships of the same color. Bear in mind that containers are from all over the globe and you are representing PSA Singapore the world-class port operator, so do make sure to move cargoes to their designated spots within the time limit! Cheers!

Supported by the future LovelyRajo.
